beam_type=0
beam_energy = 50 9450 30264.9 34305.2 34028.6 30703.8 26975.1 27044.5 27369.6 27746.9 28126.5 27779.2 27413.1 26882.3 26331.1 24512 22578 20644.1 18710.1 17191.8 15675.9 14695.9 13768.4 12933.3 12098.2 11433.4 10770.2 9830.67 8891.1 8107.64 7336.35 6880.7 6439.43 6213.76 5990.46 5520.28 5050.11 4809.09 4587.31 4365.54 4143.76 3868.78 3592.18 3381.59 3171.36 2938.91 2705.28 2495.05 2284.81 2307.97 2341.74 2375.5 2270.61 2164.19 2057.77 1951.34 1840.22 1728.04 1615.85 1503.66 1491 1494.39 1497.78 1482.94 1388.2 1293.45 1198.71 1138.77 1134.57 1130.36 1126.16 1108.57 1048.01 987.446 926.886 869.666 845.929 822.193 798.457 774.72 749.48 724.151 698.822 673.492 648.163 622.833 597.859 583.501 569.143 554.785 540.427 526.068 511.71 497.352 482.994 468.636 454.31 443.006 431.702 420.398 409.093 397.789 386.485 375.181 363.877 352.572 341.268 329.964 318.66 307.355 296.051 285.453 278.819 272.185 265.551 258.917 252.283 245.648 239.014 232.38 225.746 219.112 212.478 205.844 199.21 192.575 185.941 179.307 172.673 166.039 159.405 152.771 147.274 143.367 139.46 135.554 131.647 127.741 123.834 119.928 116.021 112.114 108.208 104.301 100.395 96.4881 92.5816 88.675 84.7684 80.8618 76.9553 73.0487 70.0752 68.666 67.2567 65.8475 64.4382 63.029 61.6197 60.2105 58.8012 57.392 55.9827 54.5735 53.1642 51.755 50.3457 48.9365 47.5272 46.118 44.7087 43.2995 42.5277 42.0615 41.5953 41.129 40.6628 40.1966 39.7303 39.2641 38.7979 38.3316 37.8654 37.3991 36.9329 36.4667 36.0004 35.5342 35.068 34.6017 34.1355 
# the PDG code of the beam particle
# 12 - nu_e    
# 14 - nu_mu
# 16 - nu_tau
# -12 - anti_nu_e
# -14 - anti_nu_mu
# -16 - anti_nu_tau

beam_particle      = -14

# The direction of the beam given as a 3 coordinates of the vector alligned with the beam

beam_direction     = 0 0 1
